# Reactmos

> Build React SPAs with modules

## Documentation Sets

- [Reactmos - REACT MOduleS](https://reactmos.dev//llms_full.txt): Build React SPAs with modules

## Getting Started

- [Introduction](https://reactmos.dev/getting-started): Welcome to Reactmos documentation
- [Installation](https://reactmos.dev/getting-started/installation): Get started with Reactmos.
- [Usage](https://reactmos.dev/getting-started/usage): Learn how write and extends modules.
- [Modules](https://reactmos.dev/getting-started/modules): How modules works
